65633.summary: Some customers in Westlock are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
65633.title: Aug 17 - Westlock | All Services - Outage (Resolved)

65634.summary: Some customers in the McQueen area of Edmonton are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
65634.title: Aug 17 - Edmonton (McQueen) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
